name.description: The name of the application associated with the flow.

id.description: The unique ID of the application generated by the system.

appInstances.description: The list of application instances associated with a flow.

supportFeedback.description: The indicator which determines whether the feedback step in a business flow is enabled.

providerPath.description: The path and the folder location of the provider associated with an application. For example, location of the primeprovider folder associated with the Oracle Primavera Prime application.

providerName.description: The Oracle Primavera Gateway provider associated with an application.

external.description: The indicator which determines whether the provider is external.

App.description: A reference to the App business object.

external.description: This indicates whether step is external or internal

id.description: The unique ID of the flow template map generated by the system.

type.description: The type of fieldmap template associated with a flow template map.

children.description: A list of flow definition applications.

id.description: The unique ID of the flow definition application generated by the system.

app.description: A reference to the App business object.

flowDefinition.description: The flow definition object associated with a flow.

disableCompare.description: The indicator that determines whether the Compare step is enabled or disabled for a flow.

FlowDefinitionApp.description: A reference to the flowDefApp business object.

name.description: The name of the fieldmap template.

id.description: The unique ID of the fieldmap template generated by the system.

type.description: The type of fieldmap template that can be created. Choices include: Direct, Java, or Groovy.

description.description: A description of the fieldmap template.

FieldMapTemplate.description: A reference to the fieldMapTemplate business object.

name.description: The name of the flowstep instance message.

id.description: The unique ID of the flowstep instance message generated by the system.

seqNo.description: The sequence number of a flowstep instance message. The sequence number determines the display order of the flowstep instance message in a sequence.

stringData.description: The input and output messages of each step in a flow.

FlowStepInstanceMessage.description: A reference to the flowStepInstMsg business object.

name.description: The name of the flow business object.

id.description: The unique ID of the business object generated by the system.

description.description: A description of the business object.

BusinessObject.description: A reference to a business object.

id.description: The unique ID of the EventProviderInstanceConfig generated by the system.

description.description: A description of the event provider instance configuration.

eventListenerConfigList.description: A reference to the EventListenerConfig business object.

eventProviderConfig.description: A reference to the EventProviderConfig business object.

id.description: The unique ID of the flow load object generated by the system.

flowBusinessObject.description: A reference to a flow business object.

FlowLoadObject.description: A reference to the flowLoadObject business object.

name.description: The name of the event provider configuration.

version.description: The version number of the event provider configuration.

configValueMap.description: The configuration value mappings associated with the event provider configuration.

value.description: The value of the event instance configuration.

id.description: The ID of the eventInstConfig object generated by the system.

eventConfig.description: A reference to the eventConfig object.

EventInstanceConfig.description: The value of the event instance configuration.

name.description: The name of the event listener.

id.description: The unique ID of the event listener generated by the system.

description.description: A description of the event listener.

flowSchedule.description: The flow schedule object associated with a flow instance.

EventListener.description: A reference to the event listener object.

id.description: The unique ID of the external step request generated by the system.

provider.description: The Provider object associated with an external step request

status.description: The status of external flow step.

flowStepInstance.description: The flowStepInstance object associated with an external step request

flowInstance.description: The flowInstance object associated with an external step request

reqData.description: The request data of external flow step.

respData.description: The response data of external flow step.

reqPara.description: The request parameters of external flow step.

errMsg.description: The error message of external flow step.

customization.description: The Customization object associated with an external step request

ExternalStepRequest.description: A reference to store the request for an external step to run.

name.description: The name of the flow definition.

priority.description: The priority of the flow definition. This value determines the order for displaying the flow definition in the Gateway user interface.

id.description: The unique ID of the flow definition generated by the system.

type.description: A description of the flow definition type.

description.description: A description of the flow definition.

hasCompareStep.description: An indicator which determines whether the Compare step exists in a flow definition.

isEnabled.description: An indicator which determines whether the flow definition is enabled.

FlowDefinition.description: The flow definition object associated with a flow.

parameterValues.description: The parameter values specified in Gateway settings.

Settings.description: A reference to the Settings object.

name.description: The name of the application  configuration.

id.description: The unique ID of the application instance configuration generated by the system.

AppConfig.description: The application configuration associated with the application instance configuration.

name.description: The name of the application instance associated with the application instance ID.

id.description: The unique ID of the application instance generated by the system.

description.description: A description of the application instance.

app.description: A reference to the App business object.

AppInstance.description: The list of application instances associated with a flow.

id.description: The unique ID of the flow instance generated by the system.

hostName.description: The host name associated with a flow instance.

status.description: The status of the flow instance. Choices include: New, Queued, Running, Delegated, On Hold, Rejected, Completed, Completed with Errors, Failed, Noop, and Completed with Warnings.

endTime.description: The end time when a flow instance was completed.

startTime.description: The start time of the flow instance.

flow.description: The flow object associated with a flow instance.

flowSchedule.description: The flow schedule object associated with a flow instance.

parentFlowInstanceId.description: The unique ID of the parent flow instance associated with the child flow instance.

childInstances.description: A list of child flow instances associated with a flow instance object.

errorDataDesc.description: A description of the error data associated with the flow instance.

flowDefName.description: The name of the flow definition.

FlowInstance.description: A reference to the flowInst business object.

id.description: The unique ID of the parameter value generated by the system.

parameter.description: A reference  to the parameter business object.

ParameterValue.description: The list of parameter values associated with a flow schedule.

name.description: The name of the event configuration.

id.description: The unique ID of the event configuration generated by the system.

type.description: The type of event configuration. Choices include: String, Integer, Double, Boolen, HiddenString, and Criteria.

title.description: The title of the event configuration.

EventConfig.description: A reference to the eventConfig object.

name.description: The name of the flow definition.

id.description: The unique ID of the flow step generated by the system.

type.description: The category of the flow step.

description.description: A description of the flow step.

FlowStep.description: A reference to the flowStep business object.

value.description: The value of the application instance configuration entered by the user.

id.description: The unique ID of the application instance configuration generated by the system.

appInstance.description: The list of application instances associated with a flow.

appConfig.description: The application configuration associated with the application instance configuration.

AppInstanceConfig.description: A list of application instance configurations associated with the application instance.

external.description: This indicates whether step is external or internal

id.description: The unique ID of the flow generated by the system.

flowDefinition.description: The flow definition object associated with a flow.

disableCompare.description: The indicator that determines whether the Compare step is enabled or disabled for a flow.

destinationApp.description: A reference to the App business object.

enableFeedback.description: The indicator which determines whether the feedback step is enabled in a business flow.

sourceApp.description: A reference to the App business object.

configSteps.description: The indicator determines whether to configure steps

Flow.description: The flow object associated with a flow instance.

id.description: The unique ID of the flow business object generated by the system.

businessObject.description: A reference to a business object.

FlowBusinessObject.description: A reference to a flow business object.

name.description: The name of the flow schedule.

id.description: The unique ID of the flow schedule generated by the system.

description.description: A description of the flow schedule.

status.description: The status of the flow schedule.

schedule.description: The schedule object associated with a flow schedule. This is used for scheduling jobs.

flow.description: The flow object associated with a flow instance.

predecessorFlowScheduleId.description: The predecessor ID of the flow schedule

predecessorFlowScheduleName.description: The predecessor Name of the flow schedule

lastCompletionDate.description: The last completion date of the flow schedule.

sourceAppInstance.description: The list of application instances associated with a flow.

eventListenerInstance.description: The event listener associated with the flow schedule.

lastJobRunStatus.description: The status of the last job run associated with the flow schedule. Values include: New, Queued, Running, Delegated, On Hold, Rejected, Completed, Completed with Errors, Failed, Noop, or Completed with Warnings.

destinationAppInstance.description: The list of application instances associated with a flow.

flowDefName.description: The name of the flow definition.

recurring.description: The indicator that determines whether a flow schedule recurs.

active.description: An indicator which determines whether the flow schedule is active.

nextRunDate.description: The next run date associated with a flow schedule.

isParent.description: The indicator that determines whether a flow schedule is a parent object.

maxRuns.description: The maximum number of runs allowed for a flow schedule.

flowInstRuns.description: The number of flow instance runs associated with a flow schedule.

lastRunJobId.description: The unique ID of the last job run in the flow schedule generated by the system.

lastStartDate.description: The last start date associated with the flow schedule.

noEndDate.description: An indicator which determines whether the flow schedule has no end date specified.

FlowSchedule.description: The flow schedule object associated with a flow instance.

id.description: The unique ID of the flowstep instance generated by the system.

status.description: The job status associated with the flowstep instance.

endTime.description: The end time of the flow step instance.

startTime.description: The start time of the flow step instance.

flowInstance.description: A reference to the flowInst business object.

flowStepInstanceMessages.description: A reference to the flowStepInstMsg business object.

warningDataDesc.description: A description of the error data associated with the warning data.

warningData.description: Depending on the flow, indicates that data is missing or that there is extra data. The synchronization will run and finish.  The user should investigate the messages and fix any problems that are found.

flowStep.description: A reference to the flowStep business object.

errorData.description: An exception occured. The synchronization has failed.

errorDataDesc.description: A description of the error data object associated with a flow step instance.

FlowStepInstance.description: A reference to the flowStepInst business object.

predecessorFlowScheduleId.description: The predecessor ID of the schedule

scheduleExpression.description: The job schedule in CRON format.

scheduleId.description: The unique ID of the schedule generated by the system.

startDate.description: The start date of a schedule.

endDate.description: The end date of a schedule.

Schedule.description: The schedule object associated with a flow schedule. This is used for scheduling jobs.

readOnly.description: An indicator which determines whether the flow parameter is a read-only object.

id.description: The unique ID of the flow parameter generated by the system.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the parameter.

required.description: The parameter that must be present when a flow is run.

parameter.description: A reference  to the parameter business object.

hidden.description: An indicator which determines whether the flow parameter is a hidden object.

FlowParameter.description: A list of flow parameter objects associated with a flow.

name.description: The name of the event listener configuration.

businessFlowName.description: The business flow name associated with the event listener configuration.

synchronizationName.description: The synchronization name associated with an event listener configuration.

getconfigValueMap.description: The configuration value mappings associated with the event listener configuration.

EventListenerConfigs.description: A reference to the EventListenerConfig business object.

valueMap.description: The criteria that needs to be satisfied for an event to be executed.

Event.description: A reference to the Event business object.

id.description: The unique ID of the parameter generated by the system.

type.description: The data type of the parameter. Values include: String, Int, Double, DateTime, Boolean, Enum, Password, Filter, Custom, HiddenString, or Group.

defaultValue.description: The default value of the parameter.

customerDefined.description: An indicator which determines whether a parameter is defined by the customer.

seqNo.description: The sequence number of a parameter. The sequence number determines the display order of the parameter in a sequence.

enumOptions.description: The enumeration options associated with a parameter.

appTitle.description: The application title associated with the parameter.

side.description: The side of a data flow that a parameter is associated with. Values include: Source, Desctination, or PDI.

group.description: The parameter group associated with the parameter.

id.description: The unique ID of the event listener instance generated by the system.

eventInstanceConfigs.description: A reference to the eventInstConfig object.

flowSchedule.description: The flow schedule object associated with a flow instance.

delayInMinutes.description: The delay in minutes before triggering a event-based synchronization job.

eventDisabled.description: The indicator which determines whether the event is disabled or eneabled.

eventListener.description: A reference to the event listener object.

EventListenerInstance.description: A reference to the event listener instance object.
